event.doc_name: First Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: (A)  Declare  that  Defendants’  actions  terminating  IES’s  performance  of  statutorily  mandated activities and impounding funds that IES would otherwise use to pay salaries, operating costs, and contract and grant obligations are unlawful;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare that Defendants’ actions terminating IES’s performance of statutorily mandated activities and impounding funds that IES would otherwise use to pay salaries, operating costs, and contract and grant obligations are unlawful

evidence.text: (B)  Declare unlawful and set aside Defendants’ mass termination of contracts, reduction in force, and termination of remote restricted-use data licenses, as arbitrary, capricious, an abuse of discretion, or otherwise not in accordance with law under 5 U.S.C. § 706(2)(A);
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare unlawful and set aside Defendants’ mass termination of contracts, reduction in force, and termination of remote restricted-use data licenses, as arbitrary, capricious, an abuse of discretion, or otherwise not in accordance with law under 5 U.S.C. § 706(2)(A)

evidence.text: (C) Order Defendants to take steps to restore terminated contracts that execute statutorily mandated tasks or enable the agency to do so;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order Defendants to take steps to restore terminated contracts that execute statutorily mandated tasks or enable the agency to do so

evidence.text: (D) Vacate any RIF as to IES employees necessary to perform the agency’s statutory functions;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Vacate any RIF as to IES employees necessary to perform the agency’s statutory functions

evidence.text: (E) Vacate the decision to terminate all remote restricted-use data licenses;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Vacate the decision to terminate all remote restricted-use data licenses

evidence.text: (F) Enjoin Defendants from taking any further steps that hinder IES’s ability to perform its statutorily mandated tasks;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Enjoin Defendants from taking any further steps that hinder IES’s ability to perform its statutorily mandated tasks

evidence.text: (G) Issue a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction directing Defendants to cease immediately actions to cease IES’s operations;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Issue a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction directing Defendants to cease immediately actions to cease IES’s operations

evidence.text: (H) Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorney’s fees, and other disbursements as appropriate;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorney’s fees, and other disbursements as appropriate

evidence.text: (I) Grant such other relief as the Court deems necessary, just, and proper.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant such other relief as the Court deems necessary, just, and proper

evidence.text: (A)  Declare the termination of NPSAS 2024 arbitrary, capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study;
evidence.source_document: First Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare the termination of NPSAS 2024 arbitrary, capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study

evidence.text: (B)  Declare the termination of BPS:20/25 arbitrary and capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study;

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare the termination of BPS:20/25 arbitrary and capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study

evidence.text: (C)  Declare the termination of HSLS:09 arbitrary and capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study;

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare the termination of HSLS:09 arbitrary and capricious, set it aside, and enjoin Defendants to resume the study
